Translations.Text: nanna janangadavare, nanu nim'medege bandiruva, allahana dutanembudannu aritiddu niveke nannannu hinsisuttiruviri? Endu musa tam'ma janangadavarodane kelidaru. Avaru (musara janangadavaru) vakra bud'dhi toridaga allahanu avara manas'sugalannu vakragolisibittanu. Allahanu avidheyarige saridariyannu torisuvudilla

‘‘Isra'ilara santatigale, nanu nim'ma balige allahana dutanagi bandiruttene. Nim'ma bali igagale iruva tauratannu nanu samarthisuttene. Mattu nanu, nanna balika baraliruva ahmad emba hesarina dutara kuritu subhavarte niduvavanagiruttene’’ endu maryamara putra isa heliddaru. Konege avaru (a dutaru) spasta puravegalondige avara balige bandaga avaru idella spasta matagarikeyagide endu bittaru
tannannu islamina kadege kareyaladaga, allahana mele sullaropagalannu horisuvavaniginta dodda akrami yariddane? Allahanu akramigalige saridariyannu toruvudilla
avaru allahana belakannu tam'ma bayigalinda (udi) nandisabayasuttare. Allahanantu tanna belakannu sampurna vyapisiye tiruvanu. Dhikkarigalige adu este apriyavagiddaru sariye

avane, margadarsana mattu satyadharmadondige tanna dutanannu kaluhisi kottavanu. Adannu avanu, itara ella dharmagaleduru vijayiyagalikkagi kalisiruvanu. Adu bahudevaradhakarige este apriyavagiddaru sari
visvasigale, nanu nimage nim'mannu (narakada) kathina sikseyinda raksisuva vyavaharavondannu tilisale
nivu allahanalli mattu avana dutaralli nambike idiri. Mattu nim'ma sampattugalannu jivagalannu todagisi allahana margadalli horadiri. Nivu ariyuvavaragiddare aduve nim'ma palige uttama

aga avanu nim'ma papagalannu ksamisuvanu mattu taladalli nadigalu hariyuttiruva svargatotagalolage nim'mannu serisuvanu. Mattu sasvatavada a svargatotagalalli (nimage) nivasagalannu odagisuvanu. Iduve maha vijayavagide
hageye, nivu pritisuva innondu vastu – allahana neravu mattu sighra vijaya (kuda nimage sigalive). Visvasigalige subha varte nidiri
